meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed tyrocidin to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: She took tyrocidin to help her get better.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the tyrocidin coming their way.
meanings.sent4: Tyrocidin acted like a brave soldier battling the germs in her body.
meanings.sent5: The tyrocidin worked tirelessly to defeat the harmful bacteria.

meanings.definition: A substance used to treat infections
meanings.sent1: The nurse administered tyrocidin to the patient.
meanings.sent2: Tyrocidin is effective in fighting off infections.
meanings.sent3: The infections ran away when they heard tyrocidin was on its way.
meanings.sent4: Tyrocidin was like a superhero swooping in to save the day from infections.
meanings.sent5: The tyrocidin quickly got to work, clearing the body of harmful germs.

meanings.sent1: The tyrocidin was made from special bacteria.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use tyrocidin, which comes from bacteria, to treat illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were surprised to see their friend turned into tyrocidin.
meanings.sent4: Tyrocidin was like a magical potion brewed from bacteria to heal the sick.
meanings.sent5: The tyrocidin was a powerful remedy sourced from friendly bacteria.
